description.en: Powerful 1200W motor with 28,000 RPM and 6-blade Powelix technology for smooth blending up to 30% faster. [Perfectmix+ BL811D high speed blender | Blenders | Tefal +2](https://www.tefal.nl/p/perfectmix-bl811d-high-speed-blender/7211002785) Features a 2L heat-resistant glass jug, three preset programs (Smoothie, Ice Crush, Auto Clean), and removable dishwasher-safe blades. [Tefal](https://www.tefal.nl/p/perfectmix-bl811d-high-speed-blender/7211002785)[SM Appliance](https://www.smappliance.com/products/tefal-tf-bl811d40-perfectmix-blender) Includes air cooling system to prevent overheating and suction feet for stable operation. [Tefal](https://www.tefal.nl/p/perfectmix-bl811d-high-speed-blender/7211002785)[SM Appliance](https://www.smappliance.com/products/tefal-tf-bl811d40-perfectmix-blender)
description.pl: Potężny silnik 1200W z prędkością 28 000 obrotów na minutę i technologią Powelix z 6 ostrzami – blenduje do 30% szybciej. [Perfectmix+ BL811D high speed blender | Blenders | Tefal +2](https://www.tefal.nl/p/perfectmix-bl811d-high-speed-blender/7211002785) Posiada szklany dzbanek 2L odporny na wysokie temperatury, trzy programy automatyczne (Smoothie, Ice Crush, Auto Clean) oraz wyjmowane ostrza nadające się do zmywarki. [Tefal](https://www.tefal.nl/p/perfectmix-bl811d-high-speed-blender/7211002785)[SM Appliance](https://www.smappliance.com/products/tefal-tf-bl811d40-perfectmix-blender) Wyposażony w system chłodzenia powietrzem zapobiegający przegrzaniu oraz przyssawki stabilizujące pracę. [Tefal](https://www.tefal.nl/p/perfectmix-bl811d-high-speed-blender/7211002785)[SM Appliance](https://www.smappliance.com/products/tefal-tf-bl811d40-perfectmix-blender)
